alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, Florence and northern Marinette Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 324 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodman, or 21 miles southwest of Kingsford, moving east at 20 mph. Additional storms were located near Crandon. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodman around 340 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Homestead and Pembine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
